summary: Comprehensive testing of TKR Coaching sales website completed successfully. Backend API testing achieved 96% success rate (23/24 tests passed). Frontend testing shows all pages loading correctly with proper navigation, authentication flow working perfectly, and responsive design functioning on mobile/tablet. Integration between frontend and backend is seamless with JWT authentication working end-to-end.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthenticated requests
minor_bugs.impact: Very minor - doesn't affect functionality, just HTTP status code consistency

ui_bugs.issue: Logout button not easily accessible when logged in

passed_tests: Homepage loads with all sections (hero, testimonials, features, podcast preview, pricing, FAQ)
Navigation menu works across all pages (Courses, Podcast, Resources, Community, Pricing)
All API endpoints functional: auth, courses, membership, resources, podcast, community, news
User registration and login flow works perfectly
Dashboard shows personalized content after login
Responsive design works on mobile (390x844) and tablet (768x1024)
Course filtering by category and tier works
Podcast episodes display with proper metadata
Community posts and news articles load correctly
Membership tiers display with proper pricing (Free, Bronze $29, Silver $79, Gold $149)
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
No JavaScript errors or console errors found
Sample data properly seeded (6 courses, 3 podcast episodes, 2 community posts, 3 news articles)
